mapper.select: SELECT goods_id, brand, name_kor, name_eng, img, im_buy, bookmark, num FROM (SELECT goods_id, brand, name_kor, name_eng, img, im_buy, bookmark, rownum as num FROM (SELECT goods_id, brand, name_kor, name_eng, img, im_buy, bookmark FROM goods_2 WHERE release_date BETWEEN TO_DATE('2022-06-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE('2022-07-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') ORDER BY release_date DESC )) WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT goods_id, category_id, brand, name_kor, name_eng, img, im_buy, bookmark, release_date, SUBSTR(release_date, 1, 2) as dbyear
FROM (SELECT goods_id, category_id, brand, name_kor, name_eng, img, im_buy, release_date, bookmark, rownum as num FROM (SELECT goods_id, category_id, brand, name_kor, name_eng, img, im_buy, release_date, bookmark FROM goods_2
WHERE type='남자' ))
WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT goods_id, brand, name_kor, name_eng, img, im_buy, bookmark, num FROM (SELECT goods_id, brand, name_kor, name_eng, img, im_buy, bookmark, rownum as num FROM (SELECT goods_id, brand, name_kor, name_eng, img, im_buy, bookmark FROM goods_2 WHERE type='여자')) WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT * FROM style_2 ORDER BY style_id DESC

SELECT img, name_kor, brand, release_date, SUBSTR(release_date, 7, 2) as dbday, release_date, SUBSTR(release_date, 4, 2) as dbmonth, release_date, SUBSTR(release_date, 1, 5) as regdate
FROM (SELECT img, name_kor, brand, release_date, rownum as num FROM (SELECT img, name_kor, brand, release_date FROM goods_2
WHERE SUBSTR(release_date, 1, 5)=#{regdate} )) WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end} ORDER BY dbday ASC
SELECT CEIL(COUNT(*)/12.0) FROM goods_2 WHERE release_date BETWEEN TO_DATE('2022-06-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE('2022-07-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD')
SELECT CEIL(COUNT(*)/12.0) FROM goods_2 WHERE type='남자'
SELECT CEIL(COUNT(*)/12.0) FROM goods_2 WHERE type='여자'
SELECT CEIL(COUNT(*)/10.0) FROM goods_2 WHERE release_date = '23/01/01'
